title: Healthcare Providers able to offer 100% Approval Patient Finance Solutions with Healthcare Finance Direct - Yahoo Finance
content: Healthcare Providers able to offer 100% Approval Patient Finance Solutions with Healthcare Finance Direct  Yahoo Finance
description: FinTech company helps practices provide affordable pay-over-time plans for every patientBakersfield, Calif., April 29, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Healthcare Finance Direct (HFD), the leading pay-over-time solutions provider for the elective healthcare industry, enables providers to offer a patient finance offering with a 100% patient approval rate.
